entries.original: Added `WS_PROXY`/`WSS_PROXY` environment support (including lowercase variants) for websocket proxying in the network proxy. (#11784)
entries.translation: 네트워크 프록시의 웹소켓 프록싱을 위해 `WS_PROXY`/`WSS_PROXY` 환경 변수 지원(소문자 변형 포함)을 추가했습니다. (#11784)

entries.original: App-server v2 now emits notifications when threads are archived or unarchived, enabling clients to react without polling. (#12030)
entries.translation: App-server v2에서 스레드가 아카이브되거나 아카이브 해제될 때 알림을 전송하여, 클라이언트가 폴링 없이 반응할 수 있도록 개선했습니다. (#12030)

entries.original: Protocol/core now carry distinct approval IDs for command approvals to support multiple approvals within a single shell command execution flow. (#12051)
entries.translation: 단일 셸 명령어 실행 흐름 내에서 여러 승인을 지원하기 위해 Protocol/core에서 명령어 승인 시 별도의 승인 ID를 전달합니다. (#12051)

entries.original: `Ctrl+C`/`Ctrl+D` now cleanly exits the cwd-change prompt during resume/fork flows instead of implicitly selecting an option. (#12040)
entries.translation: 재개/포크(resume/fork) 흐름 중 cwd 변경 프롬프트

entries.original: Reduced false-positive safety-check downgrade behavior by relying on the response header model (and websocket top-level events) rather than the response body model slug. (#12061)
entries.translation: Reduced false-positive safety-check downgrade behavior by relying on the response header model (and websocket top-level events) rather than the response body model slug. (#12061)

entries.original: Updated docs and schemas to cover websocket proxy configuration, new thread archive/unarchive notifications, and the command approval ID plumbing. (#11784, #12030, #12051)
entries.translation: Updated docs and schemas to cover websocket proxy configuration, new thread archive/unarchive notifications, and the command approval ID plumbing. (#11784, #12030, #12051)

entries.original: Made the Rust release workflow resilient to `npm publish` attempts for an already-published version. (#12044)
entries.translation: Made the Rust release workflow resilient to `npm publish` attempts for an already-published version. (#12044)

entries.original: Standardized remote compaction test mocking and refreshed related snapshots to align with the default production-shaped behavior. (#12050)
entries.translation: Standardized remote compaction test mocking and refreshed related snapshots to align with the default production-shaped behavior. (#12050)

entries.original: #11784 feat(network-proxy): add websocket proxy env support @viyatb-oai
entries.translation: #11784 feat(network-proxy): add websocket proxy env support @viyatb-oai

entries.original: #12044 don't fail if an npm publish attempt is for an existing version. @iceweasel-oai
entries.translation: #12044 don't fail if an npm publish attempt is for an existing version. @iceweasel-oai

entries.original: #12040 tui: exit session on Ctrl+C in cwd change prompt @charley-oai
entries.translation: #12040 tui: exit session on Ctrl+C in cwd change prompt @charley-oai

entries.original: #12061 Chore: remove response model check and rely on header model for downgrade @shijie-oai
entries.translation: #12061 Chore: remove response model check and rely on header model for downgrade @shijie-oai

entries.original: #12051 feat(core): plumb distinct approval ids for command approvals @owenlin0
entries.translation: #12051 feat(core): plumb distinct approval ids for command approvals @owenlin0

entries.original: #12050 Unify remote compaction snapshot mocks around default endpoint behavior @charley-oai
entries.translation: #12050 Unify remote compaction snapshot mocks around default endpoint behavior @charley-oai
